( Note: Rage is a 10 foot Tarbosaurus, which means that she's just short of 
a Rex. Not a raptor.)

* Rage was just about to sink her teeth into her meal when it saw her and 
jumped back, it was then that it made a few strange sounds towards her and 
attacked.
She shook her head as it did so but she suddenly stopped dead when 10,000 
volts of energy began to surge through her body.
Rage pulled back and roared, she had never had a meal attack her like this 
before! She took a few steps back and roared again, something was happening 
inside of her...something that seemed familiar but was so strange that it 
was frightening!
She snarled in fright as the strange feeling grew and intensified, she 
slammed her head into her prey as a strange sound came from inside of her 
head...*

Internal Systems: "Robotic Mode has now been activated, being will 
automatically transform in 3.4 nanos."

* Rage took another few steps back when everything began to change, she 
growled but finally understood the computer's last words. 'Nanos.'
She roared again as a more sudden change began to occur, she began to 
transform!
Soon, where once stood a hungry Tarbosaurus was now a bot the size of 
Megatron himself, her face was a very light blue, her optics the color of 
grey stone. Her body was well muscled but didn't lack the soft and supple 
curves of a female body, grey and black armor covered her chest and pelvic 
area, arms and legs, a red loin-cloth hung down from the front and back of 
her waist area.
Rage looked in surprise at the body that she now occupied, it was strange 
and looked like the food that she was trying to hunt.
She looked  at Scourge and stepped back but then fell, it was almost like 
she was one of their kind now! How could that be?!
It was diffacult to try and walk on these
strange legs, how could her prey actually be able to do that?
Rage looked up at Scourge, she breathed hard...what had he done to  her?!*
